products.description: A comprehensive CRM platform that helps sales teams manage leads, opportunities, and customer relationships. It enables sales professionals to close deals faster with AI-powered insights, workflow automation, and mobile access. Scalable from small teams to large enterprises with customizable features and deep integration capabilities.

A customer service platform that unifies support channels, automates case routing, and provides agents with complete customer context. It enables support teams to resolve issues faster across email, phone, chat, and social media. Includes AI-powered chatbots, knowledge base management, and real-time analytics.

A marketing automation platform for creating personalized campaigns, nurturing leads, and measuring ROI across channels. It helps marketing teams generate qualified leads through email marketing, landing pages, social advertising, and analytics. Integrates with CRM for seamless lead handoff to sales.

An e-commerce platform for creating unified shopping experiences across web, mobile, social, and in-store channels. It enables retailers to personalize customer journeys, manage product catalogs, process orders, and optimize conversions. Supports B2C and B2B commerce with AI-powered recommendations.

A business intelligence and analytics platform that transforms data into actionable insights through interactive dashboards and AI-powered predictions. It helps business users explore data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions without technical expertise. Integrates seamlessly with Salesforce and external data sources.

A platform as a service (PaaS) that allows developers to build, test, and deploy applications on Salesforce's infrastructure. It enables businesses to create custom applications tailored to their needs without managing hardware or software. Supports rapid development and deployment with a focus on scalability and security.

A collaboration hub that connects your work with the people you work with through channels, messaging, and file sharing. It helps teams communicate more effectively, share information, and collaborate on projects in real-time. Integrates with Salesforce and other tools to streamline workflows and increase productivity.

An integration platform that connects applications, data, and devices with APIs. It enables businesses to create a network of data, apps, and devices to deliver connected experiences. Supports API-led connectivity and accelerates digital transformation by simplifying integration processes.

A data visualization tool that helps businesses see and understand their data. It enables users to create interactive and shareable dashboards, analyze trends, and make data-driven decisions. Supports a wide range of data sources and offers powerful analytics capabilities.

A productivity suite that combines documents, spreadsheets, and chat in one place. It helps teams collaborate on documents and spreadsheets in real-time, manage projects, and communicate effectively. Integrates with Salesforce to provide a seamless workflow for teams.

A platform as a service (PaaS) that enables developers to build, run, and operate applications entirely in the cloud. It supports multiple programming languages and provides a range of tools and services to streamline application development and deployment.

An artificial intelligence platform that brings AI capabilities to Salesforce applications. It helps businesses automate processes, predict outcomes, and deliver personalized experiences to customers. Integrates with Salesforce products to enhance decision-making and efficiency.

A configure, price, quote (CPQ) solution that helps sales teams generate accurate quotes and proposals quickly. It enables businesses to automate pricing, discounting, and approval processes, reducing errors and accelerating sales cycles.

A billing solution that automates invoicing, payments, and revenue recognition. It helps businesses manage subscription billing, usage-based billing, and one-time charges, ensuring accurate and timely billing processes.

An order management system that helps businesses manage orders, inventory, and fulfillment processes. It enables real-time visibility into order status, inventory levels, and fulfillment progress, improving operational efficiency and customer satisfaction.

A B2B e-commerce platform that enables businesses to create personalized online storefronts for their customers. It supports complex product catalogs, pricing, and ordering processes, providing a seamless buying experience for B2B customers.

A direct-to-consumer e-commerce platform that helps businesses sell products directly to consumers online. It offers tools for managing product catalogs, pricing, promotions, and customer experiences, enabling businesses to build and scale their online presence.

A digital experience platform that enables businesses to create branded websites, portals, and mobile apps. It helps organizations deliver personalized content and experiences to customers, partners, and employees, enhancing engagement and collaboration.

A field service management solution that helps businesses deliver on-site service to customers. It enables scheduling, dispatching, and managing field technicians, ensuring efficient service delivery and customer satisfaction.

A location intelligence solution that helps businesses visualize and analyze geographic data. It enables sales and service teams to optimize routes, territories, and resource allocation, improving operational efficiency and decision-making.

A survey tool that helps businesses collect feedback from customers, employees, and partners. It enables the creation of customizable surveys, real-time analytics, and integration with Salesforce data, providing valuable insights for decision-making.

An identity and access management solution that helps businesses secure user access to applications and data. It enables single sign-on, multi-factor authentication, and user provisioning, ensuring secure and compliant access management.

A set of security tools that help businesses protect their Salesforce data and applications. It includes event monitoring, field audit trail, and platform encryption, providing enhanced security and compliance capabilities.

A data management platform that helps businesses unify and manage customer data. It enables real-time data processing, analytics, and AI-powered insights, providing a comprehensive view of customers for personalized experiences.
